messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/2003 7:49:13 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Nah, you ll get stuff occasionally...mostly when a couple people start overwhelming the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/2003 7:49:13 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Rue,
> I joined that list last week, but there didn't seem to be much activity. I
> was wondering if that list had anything different about it. Would it be a
> good idea to subscribe again? What do you think? Kristin
>

Nah, you'll get stuff occasionally...mostly when a couple people start
overwhelming the first list with legal issues meant for the SECOND list.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
